attributes.action: Do not freeze the pay of public sector employees.
attributes.background: Our emergency services, teachers, care workers, and many more public sector workers consistently work hard and have had minimal if any pay rises over the past 10years. At a time when they have worked even harder to help the country survive, do not freeze their pay! They deserve better.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reverse the disgraceful decision to yet again freeze public sector pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561208

No public sector pay freezes for the next 5 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320604

Fund an above inflation, respectful pay rise to all public sector workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/315198
